# GRAPHICS::SET_SCALEFORM_MOVIE_AS_NO_LONGER_NEEDED

## Summary
Removes a scaleform movie from script memory

## Parameters
* **SCALEFORM_INDEX\*** scaleformMovieId: Filename of the gfx file to remove

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
sets that the scaleform movie is no longer needed & can be deleted
